definition[0]: (1971-) an Australian journalist and computer software designer who is the editor of WikiLeaks, an organization that publishes information which governments try to keep secret. In 2010 he published documents about the War in Iraq and the War in Afghanistan. In February 2011 an English court decided to send him to Sweden where the police wanted to ask him questions about an accusation of sexual assault. Assange denied these accusations and appealed against the decision.
